Use Baking Soda and Vinegar: Baking soda and vinegar are effective natural cleaning agents that can be used to clean and sanitize surfaces. You can use baking soda to scrub away dirt and stains, while vinegar can disinfect the surface. Simply mix baking soda and water to create a paste, and use it to clean your hands and surfaces.

Use Salt: Salt is a natural disinfectant that can be used to clean and sanitize surfaces. You can use salt to clean your hands and surfaces, and it can also be used to clean cuts and scrapes. Simply mix salt with water to create a paste, and apply it to the affected area.

Use Lemon Juice: Lemon juice is a natural cleaning agent that can be used to clean and sanitize surfaces. You can use lemon juice to clean your hands and surfaces, and it can also be used to clean cuts and scrapes. Simply squeeze lemon juice onto the affected area, and let it sit for a few minutes before rinsing it off.

Use Rubbing Alcohol: Rubbing alcohol is a powerful disinfectant that can be used to clean and sanitize surfaces. You can use rubbing alcohol to clean your hands and surfaces, and it can also be used to clean cuts and scrapes. Simply apply rubbing alcohol to the affected area, and let it sit for a few minutes before rinsing it off.

Use Essft: Essilyft is a natural cleaning agent that can be used to clean and sanitize surfaces. You can use essilyft to clean your hands and surfaces, and it can also be used to clean cuts and scrapes. Simply mix essilyft with water to create a paste, and apply it to the affected area. Let it sit for a few minutes before rinsing it off.
